ch0247_00_dande/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, hello! I’ve been waiting for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0247_00_dande/0101_0701_02_10:
Are you ready to have a champion time?
Let’s head out on a grand adventure!
ch0247_00_dande/7101_0701_01_10:
Lots of strong Trainers from different regions are
gathered here on Pasio.
ch0247_00_dande/7101_0701_02_10:
That means I’m the challenger here! I’ll battle them
all and get even stronger!
ch0247_00_dande/7102_0701_01_10:
When it comes to food, I’d rather have something
I can eat quickly than a gourmet meal!
ch0247_00_dande/7102_0701_02_10:
The faster I can finish my meal, the more time I
have to battle!
ch0247_00_dande/7103_0701_01_10:
Once, my little brother came to me and said,
“Lee! I’m so sorry!”
ch0247_00_dande/7103_0701_02_10:
I think he might’ve lost a battle and was feeling
down about it.
ch0247_00_dande/7103_0701_03_10:
That might happen to you, too. But when it does,
you can bounce right back!
ch0247_00_dande/7103_0701_04_10:
Think about why you lost! If you do, you’ll become
an even better Trainer for it!
ch0247_00_dande/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a younger brother. He found himself an
excellent rival when he was doing the Galar
Gym Challenge.
ch0247_00_dande/7104_0701_02_10:
He used to always just try to follow in my
footsteps, but he’s got a lot stronger ever since
he started battling his rival all the time.
ch0247_00_dande/7104_0701_03_10:
One day, he might just become my rival, too!
I really hope it happens soon.
ch0247_00_dande/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you happen to have a childhood friend, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0247_00_dande/7105_0701_02_10:
I’ve got a friend who did the Gym Challenge with
me back in the day.
ch0247_00_dande/7105_0701_03_10:
She still gives me a lot of advice and even helps
me find my way when I get lost.
ch0247_00_dande/7105_0701_04_10: She’s the best childhood friend I could ask for!
ch0247_00_dande/1701_0701_01_10:
So this is where you were! I’ve got a present
for you.
ch0247_00_dande/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m sure that’ll help you build up the foundations
of your strength!
ch0247_00_dande/2501_0701_01_10:
Battling with you is an exciting clash of spirit and
Pokémon moves. It’s always a blast!
ch0247_00_dande/2501_0701_02_10: I’d like you to continue being my rival!
ch0247_00_dande/2501_0702_01_10:
I wonder how far Galar and Pasio are from
each other.
ch0247_00_dande/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m terrible at finding my way around places, so
I might not be able to find the most direct path
from Galar to see you.
ch0247_00_dande/2501_0702_03_10:
But when I get lost, I know I can count on you to
guide me!
ch0247_00_dande/2511_0701_01_10:
Everyone on the team is helping each other get
stronger! Well done!
ch0247_00_dande/2511_0701_02_10:
You’re a fantastic sync pair with a
unique strength!
ch0247_00_dande/2511_0702_01_10:
When I battle you, I can feel the love you have for
Pokémon and battling!
ch0247_00_dande/2511_0702_02_10:
Building on those feelings and making them grow
is what’s important for getting stronger!
ch0247_00_dande/3001_0701_01_10:
You ready to have a champion time today?
I woke up this morning with so much energy,
I might as well have Dynamaxed!
ch0247_00_dande/3003_0701_01_10:
My sense of direction may be complete rubbish,
but y’know what? When I get lost, sometimes I
run into the most brilliant people!
ch0247_00_dande/3005_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s got a lovely night sky, hasn’t it! If you
make a wish upon a star, who knows—it might
just drop right out of the sky for you!
